LanguageData.Apparello_PipBoy.label: Pip-Boy
LanguageData.Apparello_PipBoy.description: The Pip-Boy is a promotional accessory for the Engineer. It is a wrist-mounted Pip-Boy from the Fallout series of games with a green glowing monochrome screen, buttons and controls. The device is based on the Pip-Boy 3000, manufactured by RobCo Industries.
